text: J. Wight Giddings (September 27, 1858 – July 1, 1933) was an American politician who served in the Michigan Senate from the 28th district from 1887 to 1890 and as the 27th Lieutenant Governor of Michigan from 1893 to 1895. ==References== Category:1858 births Category:1933 deaths Category:Michigan state senators Category:Lieutenant Governors of Michigan Category:Michigan Republicans Category:19th-century American politicians
title: J. Wight Giddings
